statements: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, total_amount FROM transactions WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, category FROM transactions WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, category, total_amount FROM transactions WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_amount > 500 ORDER BY avg_amount DESC
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM transactions WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY category
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE category IN ('Clothing', 'Electronics') AND total_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM transactions WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price < 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(id) AS num_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_transactions > 5;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category='Electronics' AND price > 500 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age FROM customers ORDER BY age;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, age FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM transactions WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, preferred_category FROM preferences WHERE sustainable_option = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, join_date FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM preferences WHERE preferred_category = 'Electronics');
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, purchase_amount FROM transactions WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY customer_id, purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer;
SELECT name, email, age FROM customer WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT customer_id, name, email, age FROM customer ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comment FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM customer WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY name;

SELECT p.name AS product_name, p.price, t.total_amount FROM product p JOIN transaction_item ti ON p.product_id = ti.product_id JOIN transaction t ON ti.transaction_id = t.transaction_id WHERE t.payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT c.name AS customer_name, f.rating, f.comment FROM customer c JOIN feedback f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id WHERE f.rating >= 4;

SELECT t.transaction_date, t.payment_method, SUM(ti.quantity) AS total_quantity, SUM(t.total_amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction t JOIN transaction_item ti ON t.transaction_id = ti.transaction_id GROUP BY t.transaction_date, t.payment_method ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
